* **Gauge interest:** The open-ended question invites Bob to engage and potentially reveal how interested he is. His response will guide your next move.

**Important:**  This is just an opening move. Be prepared to negotiate. If Bob outright rejects the offer, you can gradually lower the price, but never go below your guaranteed $800,000 from John.
